add_library(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} STATIC ${ANTLR4_RUNTIME_SRC})

target_include_directories(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
)

if (WIN32)
    target_compile_definitions(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PRIVATE
        -DANTLR4CPP_EXPORTS
        -DANTLR4CPP_STATIC
    )
endif()


if ("${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}" STREQUAL "Debug")
    if(MSVC)
        target_compile_options(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PRIVATE
            /W4 /Od
        )
    else()
        target_compile_options(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PRIVATE
            -g -Wall -O0
        )
    endif()
else()
    if(MSVC)
        target_compile_options(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PRIVATE
            /O2
        )
    else()
        target_compile_options(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PRIVATE
            -w -O3
        )
        target_compile_options(${ANTLR4_RUNTIME} PUBLIC
            -Wno-attributes
        )
    endif()
endif()
